subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Max Novak had a goal and an assist and top-seeded Union beat Providence, 3-1, to win the N.C.A.A. East Region championship and advance to the Frozen Four for the second time in three years.
snippet: Max Novak had a goal and an assist and top-seeded Union beat Providence, 3-1, to win the N.C.A.A. East Region championship and advance to the Frozen Four for the second time in three years.
